name: Territory: Farming and Fighting
description:
The core gameplay of the game is village management + commanding and fighting. Players can develop from a small village of a dozen people to a small kingdom of thousands of people.
Internally arrange residents to work and carry out production and construction. Gathering, fishing and hunting, farming and mining, processing and manufacturing.
Players only need to arrange work tasks and assign occupations, and then the residents will complete them independently.
Conduct foreign trade, accumulate rare materials, increase strength, and fight against evil forces and monsters.

I am developing alone, and the content in this language is translated by Google. It should be translated very badly, which is equivalent to not supporting this language. In the future, people will be hired to help with translation, but now the main focus is on the development of gameplay. Before that, temporarily cancel the language support setting.
